text: Geranium himalayense (common names Himalayan crane's-bill or lilac cranesbill) is a species of hardy flowering herbaceous perennial plant in the genus Geranium, family Geraniaceae. It is native to the Himalayas, parts of Russia and western China. It has a sprawling habit, violet-blue flowers and deeply cut palmate foliage. ==References== himalayense Category:Flora of Central Asia Category:Flora of East Himalaya Category:Flora of West Himalaya Category:Flora of China Category:Plants described in 1862
title: Geranium himalayense
